# Accessing Data
```{r}
# Load package
library(rscorecard)

sc_key('lt36uO4r7wWfcijac20x6e6FforftHUitahjuh1A')


df <- sc_init() %>% 
    sc_filter(region == 2, ccbasic == c(21,22,23), locale == 41:43) %>% 
    sc_select(unitid, instnm, stabbr) %>% 
    sc_year("latest") %>% 
    sc_get()
head(df)

dict_df <- sc_dict('.', print_off = TRUE, return_df = TRUE)
dict_df
```
